1115790.name: Etherborn - Soundtrack
1115790.description:
The Etherborn Original Soundtrack by Gabriel Garrido García and Altered Matter.

An hour of original live-recorded music, featuring:
  • the complete score from the game
  • additional musical pieces
  • music sheets

Credits

Music Composition & Orchestration - Gabriel Garrido García

Recorded & Mixed in Abuelita Studios.

Violin I - Sara Balasch Lozano
Violin II - Ernest Martinez Solà
Viola - Pepi Izquierdo Martínez
Cello - Marta Pons García

Clarinet - Raül Verdú Sellés
Bassoon - Carlos Martín Esteve

Soprano - Flavia Camacho Martínez

Mixer Engineer - Stefano Maccarrone
Mixer Engineer - Maria Salnikova
Recording Engineer - Dan Hammond
Studio Assistant - Matias Lizana García
1115790.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 日语, 韩语, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
